title: Hour 3 - Ed Orgeron (07-16-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Ed Orgeron (07-16-20)
description:
LSU Head Football Coach Ed Orgeron tells Dan that he is fired up and ready to get the team back ready to go for the upcoming season. Coach Ed says they have a program that should take the program all the way up to camp. Coach also says he would eat anything that his recruit's mother would fix to eat except liver.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
LSU Head Football Coach Ed Orgeron tells Dan that he is fired up and ready to get the team back ready to go for the upcoming season. Coach Ed says they have a program that should take the program all the way up to camp. Coach also says he would eat anything that his recruit's mother would fix to eat except liver.
